thread.title: Trottier Foundation donates $1 million towards search for extraterrestrial life (Université de Montréal)
thread.title_full: Trottier Foundation donates $1 million towards search for extraterrestrial life (Université de Montréal) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Trottier Foundation donates $1 million towards search for extraterrestrial life (Université de Montréal)
text: ( Source : Université de Montréal ) Picture : ESO /L. Calçada Université de Montréal researchers are determined to be the first to discover life elsewhere in the Universe , a goal backed by a $1 million in research grants donated by the Trottier
